thread.title: MJ Brett
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by MJ Brett

author: MJ Brett
title: MJ Brett
text: I'd been hunting for a Barbour jacket at a competitive price for some time. I found what I was looking for on the Country Attire website, placed my order and received the jacket in a couple of days. Not disappointed and would recommend.
